caezar: ^Welcome to UPV. First day survival rate is currently 100%, I see.
^So, freshie. What's the plan? You here to get honors, or here to save the world?

c-0: ^ I need to maintain my scholarship. Grades are priority.
c-1: ^ I want to meet people. Join orgs.
c-2: ^ I just want to graduate on time.

answer_response: ^Good answers. Just remember: UP isn't just about the classroom. Look at this. (He gestures to the field and the trees.) Don't forget to look up once in a while.
